subject: Portable Ghost Box System video
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I have produced another video, this one of my completed portable Ghost 
Box System (Mike's Box 12.470)
This video, in three parts on YouTube walks you through how the chamber 
system works, while describing the components and going through the 
description of how to control the devices with the chamber closed.

Video - Portable Ghost Box System Part 1 of 3
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eUOkWGrz94s

Video - Portable Ghost Box System Part 2 of 3
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xirOLjEf1bQ

Video - Portable Ghost Box System Part 3 of 3
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vs7ep7-G7Aw

- Mike
